q: why do the long hair men clench their fist
pred: The long hair men clench their fist as a sign of solidarity and support. They are seen in the video holding hands and standing together in a line. The act of clenching their fist is a symbol of unity and strength, and it is often used as a gesture of support or solidarity among friends, family, or even strangers.
